instruction.en:
1. Press and hold key button (3 sec)
2. Enter [Master PIN] + [*]
3. Enter [9] + [*]
4. Enter [1]
instruction.no:
1. Hold nøkkelknappen (3 sek)
2. Tast [Master PIN] + [*]
3. Tast [9] + [*]
4. Tast [1]
